name: Trash Magnet
description:
Trash Magnet - Cruise around in a hovering garbage truck while picking up and disposing of rubbish using your fancy trash magnet.

Trash Magnet was created for the Pompous Trash Jam 2021 event hosted by the Dallas Society of Play.

Modifiers used: 

  • Terrible Controls
  • Reused Assets

------------

Created by:

Gerad Paris - Gameplay Programmer / VFX Artist

Jared Roberge - Game Designer / Texture Artist

Jon Catalano - Backend Programmer

Aidan Hastie - 3D Model Artist

Brandon Hodkin - Title art /  Texture Artist

------------

Project files if you want to take a look at them:
